src:
AccuWeather: Sunny, blustery and cooler Friday
01 Nov 2019, 21:17 by WABC



NEW YORK (WABC) -- Skies will clear by Friday morning, but the day will also bring gusty winds and much cooler temperatures.
Here is the 7-day forecast for the Tri-State area:

Friday

Windy and clearing with a high of 56.
SaturdayBright but cool. High 53.
SundayCool sunshine for the TCS NYC Marathon. High 52.
MondayStill chilly with a high of 54.
TuesdayTurning milder with a high of 60.
WednesdayChance of showers. High 57.
ThursdayChilly and windy with a high of 52.
Click here for the latest watches and warnings from the National Weather Service.
Check the weather any time at abc7NY.com/weather. For weather updates wherever you go, please download the AccuWeather app.

Here's a look at the 7 Day AccuWeather forecast





RELATED
